channel.title: SigNoz
channel.description: SigNoz is an open-source observability tool to help you find issues in your deployed applications & solve them quickly. It provides logs, metrics, and traces under a single pane of glass. Built with ClickHouse as datastore, it is designed to handle enterprise scale.
channel.item: https://signoz.io/blog/opentelemetry-ruby Tracing a Ruby application with OpenTelemetry for performance monitoring https://signoz.io/blog/opentelemetry-ruby undefined Sat, 07 Jan 2023 00:00:00 GMT address@yoursite.com (SigNoz Inc) OpenTelemetry InstrumentationRuby
